idea-plugin.name: IDEA Jetty Runner
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin that allows you to quickly run Jetty from IntelliJ IDEA CE.
If you require full Jetty support please consider buying the IntelliJ IDEA Enterprise Edition.
This plugin should be Win / Mac / Linux compatible.
tags: jetty, container, webapp, runner, tomcat
